content: Does anyone have experience with elearning content creation and delivery? The amount of options is overwhelming
@diego kaminker has some experience

Hi Vadim. We created the FHIR Fundamentals Course ran from HL7 Argentina for HL7 International. We ran until now 6 editions, covering DSTU2 and now STU3. Four weeks covering FHIR Intro and Basics, Transactions and Profiles. It's mostly practical, we have a HAPI FHIR server for our students here they can post, get and retrieve. This course is available for HL7 Affiliates all over the world to run their own edition. More details here: http://www.hl7.org/events/fhir_fun.cfm. How can I help you?
@diego kaminker how did you create the content and which platform did you use to deliver it?
Platform: Moodle, Content Creation: PDFs, Moodle Native Content, Some videos, Our own FHIR server
